sections.title: Chorus

| k- s- kk s- | k- s- kk s- |
lyrics: Hold me like you'll never let me go
Let your skin talk to my soul

sections.title: Verse
lyrics: Tonight theres nothing getting in our way
The ties that bind, the wheres and whys
Take em off and leave them all outside

sections.title: Bridge
lyrics: Baby we can say so much
Reveal everything with just one touch
